alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued November 19 at 2:30AM EST until November 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts to 45 mph are also expected, especially on the ridge tops. This could result in a few downed tree limbs or power lines.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
